spx.utils

Class SysUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • spx.utils.SysUtils

  • public class SysUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The SysUtils class contains system utilities.

    These system utilities use the Java Native Interface to access native C code that is specific to each platform.

    These functions are supported under 32-bit and 64-bit Linux and 32-bit and 64-bit Windows.

      • getCanvasWindowHandle

        public static long getCanvasWindowHandle(java.awt.Canvas c)
        Gets the native window handle associated with a Canvas.

        Under Linux this is an X ID.

        Under Windows this is an HWND.

        Parameters:
        c - Canvas.
        Returns:
        Window handle or -1 on error.

      • getJFrameWindowHandle

        public static long getJFrameWindowHandle(javax.swing.JFrame f)
        Function to get the window handle associated with a JFrame.

        Under Linux this is an X ID.

        Under Windows this is an HWND.

        Parameters:
        f - JFrame.
        Returns:
        Window handle or -1 on error.

      • queryStartRDC

        public static void queryStartRDC()
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the RDC is running. If not then start it.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the RDC executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the RDC process.

      • queryStartRDC

        public static void queryStartRDC(java.lang.String filename)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the RDC is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename that defines the location of the RDC executable.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the RDC executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the RDC process.

      • queryStartRDC

        public static void queryStartRDC(java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.lang.String[] argv)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the RDC is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename that defines the location of the RDC executable.
        argv - NULL terminated list of arguments to pass to the RDC process if it is started. If set then the first argument must be the executable name.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the RDC executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the RDC process.

      • queryStartRDC

        public static void queryStartRDC(java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.lang.String[] argv,
                                 int waitMSecs)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the RDC is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename that defines the location of the RDC executable.
        argv - NULL terminated list of arguments to pass to the RDC process if it is started. If set then the first argument must be the executable name.
        waitMSecs - Time to wait after starting the RDC process before returning.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the RDC executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the RDC process.

      • queryStartProc

        public static boolean queryStartProc(java.lang.String procName)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the specified process is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        procName - Name of process to start. On Windows, the ".exe" may be omitted.
        Returns:
        true if process was started, false if process already running (or on error).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the proces.

      • queryStartProc

        public static boolean queryStartProc(java.lang.String procName,
                                     java.lang.String envVarDir)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the specified process is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        procName - Name of process to start. On Windows, the ".exe" may be omitted.
        envVarDir - Directory to check relative to SPX environment variable.
        Returns:
        true if process was started, false if process already running (or on error).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the proces.

      • queryStartProc

        public static boolean queryStartProc(java.lang.String procName,
                                     java.lang.String envVarDir,
                                     java.lang.String[] procArgv)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the specified process is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        procName - Name of process to start. On Windows, the ".exe" may be omitted.
        envVarDir - Directory to check relative to SPX environment variable.
        procArgv - NULL terminated list of arguments to pass to the process if it is started. If set then the first arugment must be the executable name.
        Returns:
        true if process was started, false if process already running (or on error).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the proces.

      • queryStartProc

        public static boolean queryStartProc(java.lang.String procName,
                                     java.lang.String envVarDir,
                                     java.lang.String[] procArgv,
                                     int waitMSecs)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Check to see if the specified process is running. If not then start it.
        Parameters:
        procName - Name of process to start. On Windows, the ".exe" may be omitted.
        envVarDir - Directory to check relative to SPX environment variable.
        procArgv - NULL terminated list of arguments to pass to the process if it is started. If set then the first arugment must be the executable name.
        waitMSecs - Time to wait after starting the process before returning.
        Returns:
        true if process was started, false if process already running (or on error).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the executable file could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while trying to launch the proces.
